be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class WeightedItemSet

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.ItemSet
      be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.WeightedItemSet

public class WeightedItemSet
extends ItemSet

This class holds an ordered set of weighted items.

All the methods of this class are similar to those of its superclass adapted to handle weights.

The algorithms involving unknown values are those of C4.5 (Ross Quinlan).

Constructor Detail

public WeightedItemSet(AttributeSet attributeSet)
Builds a new empty weighted item set.

Parameters:
attributeSet - The set of attributes describing the items of the set.

WeightedItemSet

public WeightedItemSet(ItemSet itemSet)
Builds a new weighted item set that contains the same items as an ItemSet, with weights set to 1.

Parameters:
itemSet - A set of items.
Method Detail

add

public void add(Item item,
                double weight)
Adds a weighted item to the set. This item must be compatible with this set's attribute set.

Parameters:
item - An item.
weight - The item weight.

add

public void add(Item item)
Adds a weighted item to the set. This item must be compatible with this set's attribute set. The weight is set to 1.

Overrides:
add in class ItemSet
Parameters:
item - An item.

add

public void add(java.util.Vector items,
                java.util.Vector weights)
Adds all the items of a vector. All the elements of the vector must be items compatible with this set's attribute set.

Parameters:
items - A vector of Items.
weights - A vector of weights associated to items, represented as Double.

size

public double size()
Returns the sum of this set's items weights. (This can be see as the size of this set if items are partially counted according to their weight.)

Overrides:
size in class ItemSet
Returns:
The sum of this set's items weights.

Overrides:
bestSplitTest in class ItemSet

entropy

public double entropy(SymbolicAttribute attribute)
Computes the entropy of the set regarding a given symbolic attribute. The frequency of each value of this attribute is counted according to the weights. The value of this attribute must be known for all the items of this set.

Overrides:
entropy in class ItemSet
Parameters:
attribute - The attribute agains which to compute the entropy.
Returns:
The computed entropy.

split

public ItemSet[] split(Test test)
Splits the set according to a test.

Overrides:
split in class ItemSet
Parameters:
test - A test on an attribute of this set's items.
Returns:
The resulting sets split by the test. The i-th element of the array matches the i-th issue of the test.
